title: CBSL warns two more errant money changers
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Central Bank of Sri Lanka again took regulatory actions against two errant money changers, the CBSL said.
i.Swiss Money Exchange (Pvt) Ltd, Colombo 01 (Head Office) and Colombo 06 (Branch)
Sri Lankan President declares Public Emergency with effect from 1st April
21 Mirihana Protestors granted bail; 6 others remanded to 4th April for identification parade
